name: Resourcefight
description:
The year is 21XX. Humanity has not succeded in creating artificial resources in order to live.

After consuming almost all of the planet earth resources, only a few cities hasn't crumble of hunger and thirst.

In order to save the most resources possible, those cities walled themselves, establishing their Central Government, which equally distributes wealth, food and water.

And There are peripheral zones, which can receive support from the Central Government.

However, to avoid unnecessary bloodshed, each zone need a representant that will fight his/her way against other zones representants, by acquiring points doing missions. 

After the points calculation, the zone of the winner with the most points will receive a portion of the resources, ensuring their development and survival.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was an entry for the Begginers Circle Jam #4.

All assets made by me

Controls (RECOMMENDED GAMEPAD):

  • LeftStick - Move
  • Cross, A - Jump 
  • Square, X - Attack
  • Circle, B - Block (if is pressed on block animation,  you can throw an attack) 
  • Right Trigger, Triangle, Y - Dash
